captions.text: >>NOW CHRISTIAN, WE THINK YOU'RE A GREAT
FIT FOR THE PART OF MOSES.
YOU GOT THE FAN BASE, THE OSCAR FIREPOWER.
YOU DIDN'T HAVE TO DRESS UP OF COURSE,
THIS AUDITION IS JUST A FORMALITY.
>>I'M A METHOD ACTOR, SO YOU KNOW.
UH, MOSES JUST GOT OFF MOUNT SINAI.
HE'S PRETTY HAGGARD, BUT HE HAS TO DELIVER
THIS IS MY BATMAN VOICE AND THIS IS MY HAGGARD VOICE.
I'M JUST WONDERING, CAN YOU IMAGINE THAT VOICE

WE'RE GOING TO DO A FEW MORE SCENES AND I
WANT
YOU TO STAY AS FAR AWAY FROM BATMAN AS POSSIBLE.
>>WHY WOULD THE RED SEA COME IN BLACK?

>>I'M GOING TO MAKE THIS STAFF TURN INTO A
SERPENT.
HE'S NEVER PLAYED A PART LIKE THIS BEFORE.
THEN COMES BACK TO SAVE HIS PEOPLE.
THAT'S THE ENTIRE PLOT OF BATMAN!
I NEED A CHARACTER WITH EMOTION.
>>THERE CAN BE MIRACLES, WHEN YOU BELIEVE.
>>LOOK, I'M ONLY GOING TO DO THIS

IF I CAN GET MICHAEL CAINE TO PLAY THE PART
OF JETHRO.
SOME MEN JUST WANT TO WATCH BUSHES BURN.
THIS IS WHAT WE'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR.

I STILL HAVEN'T GIVEN YOU 
THE ROLE.

title: Christian Bale Auditions for Exodus - Studio C
